title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: The right tree and text do not behave as expected and do not lose focus on Windows.
EB: When running the attached code in build 20020920, the right tree and text should behave as they should on both Windows and Linux, and correctly lose focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the attached code in build 20020920.
2. Run the program.
3. Observe the behavior of the right tree and text on Windows.
